cover_letter: With over 7 years of experience in healthcare AI and NLP, I can design and implement a reliable chatbot for symptom checking and triage. My expertise in TensorFlow and medical NLP will ensure accuracy and patient trust.
notes_for_client: I suggest using a medical NLP dataset and will ensure compliance with healthcare standards.

cover_letter: As a full stack developer, I can build scalable backend APIs and integrate the chatbot into multiple platforms. My experience with healthcare startups ensures robust and secure systems.
I specialize in healthcare UX and can design an intuitive chatbot interface that patients will find easy to use. Accessibility and patient engagement are my priorities.
I will design secure ETL pipelines for integrating medical data into your chatbot system. My background in HIPAA-compliant data engineering ensures that privacy and compliance are never compromised.
I have 6 years of experience building immersive VR simulators. I can develop your training platform with Unity3D, ensuring high realism and interactive learning.
As a 3D artist, I can design realistic assets and animations that bring your VR training modules to life. My focus is on immersive environments and accurate details.
I will design the learning curriculum and instructional flow for the VR platform. My expertise ensures that training modules are pedagogically sound and engaging.
As a backend developer, I can architect scalable APIs and cloud infrastructure for your VR training platform. This ensures smooth real-time interactions and system reliability.
